thread.title: BRIEF-Novartis Enters Agreement To Acquire AveXis For $8.7 Bln

title: BRIEF-Novartis Enters Agreement To Acquire AveXis For $8.7 Bln
text:
April 9, 2018 / 4:54 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Novartis Enters Agreement To Acquire AveXis For $8.7 Bln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 9 (Reuters) - Novartis AG: 
* NOVARTIS ENTERS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE AVEXIS INC. FOR USD 8.7 BN TO TRANSFORM CARE IN SMA AND EXPAND POSITION AS A GENE THERAPY AND NEUROSCIENCE LEADER 
* NOVARTIS ENTERS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE AVEXIS INC. FOR USD 8.7 BN TO TRANSFORM CARE IN SMA AND EXPAND POSITION AS A GENE THERAPY AND NEUROSCIENCE LEADER 
* NOVARTIS AG- ‚ÄçASSUMING MID 2018 COMPLETION, ACQUISITION IMPACT WOULD BE SLIGHTLY NEGATIVE TO CORE OPERATING INCOME IN 2018 AND 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
